content.text: Match ends, Barcelona 5, Mallorca 0.
Second Half ends, Barcelona 5, Mallorca 0.
Goal!  Barcelona 5, Mallorca 0. Dani Alves (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box to the top right corner. Assisted by Lionel Messi following a set piece situation.
Pedro Bigas (Mallorca) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Pedro Bigas (Mallorca).
